name: Kokurase Episode 1
summary: The Kokurase gang, also known as Cupid’s Helpers, is out to help freshman Sakura woo Yoshimitsu, a popular senior with every other girl in school vying for his heart. Switch between members to bring these two lovebirds together in an intertwining tale.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 发行日期: 2016年11月11日
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/520910/Kokurase_Episode_1/
  • 开发: galanti, Vaka Game Magazine
  • 发行: Degica, Vaka Game Magazine
